text: Francesco Marrai (born 4 February 1993) is an Italian competitive sailor. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's Laser class, finishing 12th. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – Laser
title: Francesco Marrai
